long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing "Pick Color" - the minimial Chrome extension that transforms your screen into a digital color palette. With a single click, you can effortlessly pluck any color from your screen and instantly access its hexadecimal or RGB code. Whether you're a web designer seeking the perfect shade, a digital artist capturing inspiration, or simply curious about the colors around you, "Pick Color" simplifies the process. Build custom color palettes, keep track of your selections, and export colors for seamless integration into your projects. Explore the world of color with ease, and download "Pick Color" to unlock your creative potential today.

P.S The extension is fully open-source, find the source code at: https://github.com/siddsarkar/color-picker-browser-extension

Features
- Pick color from anywhere of your screen.
- Elegant UI and intuitive interface.
- Copy color as HEX, RGB, HSL format.
- Copy color as SCSS, LESS, CSS format (Coming Soon).
- Copy color as Swift UIColor, Android Color (Coming Soon).


UPDATES
